alert.note: Alert for Anasco; Las Marias; Maricao; Mayaguez; Sabana Grande (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 10 at 4:06PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Anasco, Las Marias, Maricao, Mayaguez and Sabana Grande. * WHEN...Until 500 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. Quick rises along rivers and small streams due to excessive rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 306 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mayaguez, Las Marias, Anasco, Hormigueros, Sabana Grande, La Playa, Maricao, Espino, Liborio Negron Torres and Lluveras. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Anasco; Las Marias; Maricao; Mayaguez; Sabana Grande
